text: FACA may refer to: * Federación Anarco-Comunista de Argentina, a platformist anarchist political organisation in Argentina * Federal Advisory Committee Act, a United States statute * Federation of Anglican Churches in the Americas * Military of the Central African Republic, les Forces armées centrafricaines * Fiji Cycling Association * Facatativa, Colombia. A city and municipality in the Cundinamarca Department in Colombia, South America
title: FACA
